title: Filter Non-Unique List Values | Challenge
description: In Python, a list is a collection of items that can be of different data types. Sometimes, we need to filter out the non-unique values from a list. In this challenge, you will create a function that takes a list as an argument and returns a new list with only the unique values.

meta.title: Python List Filtering | Unique Values Extraction
meta.description: Learn how to filter out non-unique values from a Python list using the collections.Counter method and list comprehension.
meta.keywords: Python, list, filtering, unique values, collections.Counter, list comprehension
